songs.songName: For Those Who Died With Sword in Hard
The Youth of Finn Mac Cool

songs.lyrics:
Xeru Sword of the Brave
Skos Shield of the Wise and Faithful
The Eye of Wotan casts its glance
Over wooded battlefields

Rin the Everflowing Blood
Guardian of the Sacred Land
Whala Spears shall fall
Donar is guiding us all!

Let the soil of Wotan's land
Soak the blood of Mars' and his legions
By Tiwaz's spear the empire ends here
We drew the line
The empire ends at the Rhein
In Varus Battle

Armin leader of folks
Bringer of Unity and Faith
Lead us all to Triumph
By Wotan shall Germania remain Free!

Sodden paths our battlefield
Sudden ambush and assault
Roman blood paints the altars
Sacrifice and Victory!

Let the soil of Wotan's land
Soak the blood of Mars' and his legions
By Tiwaz's spear the empire ends here
We drew the line
The empire ends at the Rhein
In Varus Battle

I never thought
The legends were true
Now the golden hall opens it gates
To it's dying son

As one battle fades
Another one soars
I take my place
At Odin's side

Blood runs fresh and fast
Through my veins
I am now ready to fight
Forevermore

I can see the battle in the sky
Eternal battle way up high
I can see the battle in the sky
Eternal battle way up high

Clad in a white wolf's skin
Newly tempered blade at hand
My forefathers welcome their son
Allfather here I am

Should I be granted a wish
One last warriors prayer
Then let my blade never dull
And let me fight for eternity

(x2)
Blood runs fresh and fast
Through my veins
I am now ready to fight
Forevermore

Blood runs fresh and fast
Through my veins
I am now ready to fight
Forevermore

I can see the battle in the sky
Eternal battle way up high
Way up high

Blood, scars and wounds
I shape my own fate
Falsehood forgers
My life as my needs

Wrath of the gods
Or envy of men
Evil and treachery
Shall never defeat me

Before the gods
I swear to never
Give up the fight, the fight
Before the gods
I swear to never
Give up the fight, the fight
Wrath of the gods

Fire of anger
Of trust betrayed
Spirit of ice
Stillness of soul

Rough tempered heart
Trial by solitude
The strong lips or iron
The blade unsheathed

Before the gods
I swear to never
Give up the fight, the fight
Before the gods
I swear to never
Give up the fight, the fight
Wrath of the gods

Scarred and wounded
I rise once again
I am undefeatable
Unbreakable

Ostracised, exiled
Yet unvanquished
I am impassable
Indomitable

Before the gods
I swear to never
Give up the fight, the fight
Before the gods
I swear to never
Give up the fight, the fight
Wrath of the gods

Wrath of the gods

songs.songName: Battle At the End of TIme
